short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identify and preview fonts used on any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Font Genius, the go-to Chrome extension for all your font identification needs! With a simple and intuitive interface, Font Genius makes it incredibly easy for users to identify and preview fonts used on any webpage. Whether you're a web designer, developer, or simply someone who loves beautiful typography, this extension is tailor-made for you.

Font Genius offers a plethora of features that cater to your font finding needs. Instantly discover the name, size, and style of any font on a webpage with just one click. Say goodbye to the days of tediously searching for font information, as Font Genius brings it right to your fingertips!

Not only does Font Genius identify fonts, but it also allows users to quickly copy font styles to the clipboard for easy use in other applications. This lightweight and easy-to-use tool will streamline your design process and boost your productivity.

With a strong focus on user experience, the extension is designed to be accessible to everyone, regardless of their background in web design or typography. Get ready to revolutionize the way you work with fonts on the web. Install Font Genius today and unlock a world of beautiful typography at your fingertips!
